name: Wm. Wrigley Jr. Company
description: The Wm. Wrigley Jr. Company, a subsidiary of Mars, Incorporated, is a leading global manufacturer of chewing gum and confectionery products. Established in 1891 by William Wrigley Jr. in Chicago, Illinois, the company has a rich history and a portfolio of iconic brands that include Wrigley's Spearmint, Doublemint, Juicy Fruit, and Big Red. Wrigley is known for its commitment to quality and innovation, constantly developing new flavors and products to meet consumer preferences. Beyond gum, the company has expanded into various confectionery segments, including mints and candy, thereby solidifying its presence in the sweet snacks market. With a focus on sustainability, Wrigley is also dedicated to responsible sourcing and reducing its environmental impact across its operations. The company’s long-standing tradition of excellence and innovation has made it a staple in households around the world. As part of Mars, Incorporated, Wrigley benefits from its parent company's extensive resources and global reach, enabling it to continue its growth and fulfill its mission of delivering delicious and enjoyable products to consumers.
